title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-20 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The Advanced Public Speaking course allows students with a basic understanding of public speaking to extend their abilities through theory and practice while focusing on civic persuasion. Classes consist of theory lecture followed by speeches. Students develop research and organizational skills necessary for clear, concise, and engaging presentations. Students will also improve their individual public speaking delivery style by studying public speaking skills as both a speaker and an observer.
